Ninja AF101 Review

Reliable air fryer with crisp results and dishwasher-safe basket.

Check price View on Amazon

Quick verdict

Ninja AF101 is best for Budget-conscious shoppers who still want strong performance. It stands out for Great crisping at a lower price point, but may not suit buyers who need Cooking for more than two people.

Specs

Capacity 4 qt
Power 1550 W
Temperature range 105–400°F
Basket type Nonstick, round
Controls Digital
Dishwasher safe parts Yes
Dimensions 8.5 x 12.1 x 11.0 in
Warranty 1 year
Noise level Moderate

Pros

  • Crisp finish
  • Solid build
  • Easy cleaning

Cons

  • Small capacity
  • Basic presets

Alternatives

Cosori Air Fryer

Strong performance in a compact footprint

Dash Tasti-Crisp Air Fryer

Ultra-compact air fryer for tight spaces

Ready to buy?

Buy on Amazon Check latest price

FAQ

Does the Ninja AF101 cook evenly?
Yes, it delivers consistent crisping when food is placed in a single layer.
